item.title: Red One Is Closing In On A Pivotal Dwayne Johnson Box Office Milestone To Curb Its Disappointment Status
item.description: Red One may become the lowest grossing movie featuring Johnson in a leading role in the last decade if it doesn't surpass 2017's Baywatch.

item.title: Chris Evans' Post-Endgame Movies Made His MCU Return For Avengers: Doomsday Inevitable
item.description: Chris Evans will return to the MCU in 2026's Avengers: Doomsday, which is an inevitable career choice following his projects after Avengers: Endgame.

item.title: Is Cillian Murphy's Jim Hidden In 28 Years Later's Trailer?
item.description: Since it was confirmed Cillian Murphy's Jim would return in 28 Years Later, it's hard not to wonder whether he is actually in the movie's new trailer.
